attributes.action: Introduce Law to prevent a Lawyer becoming Prime Minister in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Law of the land is the most important   differential between us and thugs. The Law should be clear, concise and understandable by Common People. Over the last 10 years, our laws have descended to a state where no-one knows what is right and wrong. The truth has become secondary to the spin, resulting in a breakdown in law and order.
The Prime Minister, voted by the People for the People, it is one of there primary jobs to ensure people and companies abide by the Law. 
The more complicated they become with exceptions, Guidelines etc. the more it becomes perverted. The easier it is the argue English rather than what is Right and Wrong or the Truth. 
As the country decends into Pottersville (See Its a Wonderful Life), it appears the current Prime Minister is happy with subjective words like reasonable force, which can be argued either way.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
